title: A prova de tudo episodios 1 ao 6
description:
Launched in passed July, the series of the Discovery Channel "To the Test of Everything" already became one of the great successes of the canal. In each episode, Grylls presents techniques of survival in some of inhospitable most beautiful places e of the planet. Armed a knife, a water bottle and a rock of lighter, Grylls if spear of parachute and leave to the search the way in return to the civilization. Former-soldier of the Special Unit of the British Air service, Grylls is an experienced traveller. It already conquered the peak of the Everest, crossed the frÃƒÂ­gido Atlantic Ocean North in a small boat and travelled the British Islands of jet ski. To produce the program, Grylls he travels with two cinegrafistas, under strict orders of if not involving or helping it, not to be that it if finds in a situation of highest risk. The series accents the dramatical aspects of the fight for the survival, while Grylls makes question to demonstrate necessary techniques in extremely difficult circumstances.
